parameters:
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey there, Segi-san. If there's anything in our stock that
can be of use to you, feel free to take it without
hesitation.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey there, Segi-san. If there's anything in our stock that
can be of use to you, don't hesitate to pick it up.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey there, Miss Segi. If there's anything in our stock that
can be of use to you, feel free to take it without
hesitation.
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Ah, Miss Segi, welcome. What brings you here?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Yeah, looks like she's been here. Her entourage is with her
too. They've been holed up on the second floor for a while
now... Wonder what they're doing?

\N<Segi>That... If it's possible, could you call Rame-chan down here
for me?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>The thing is, I've been told not to let anyone in the room.
By Fubii. And man, they were pretty intense about it. Scared
me a bit, even though I'm older, haha.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>You see, I was told by Fubii not to let anyone into the
room. And they were really intense about it. Even though I'm
older, I got scared, haha.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>I was told not to let anyone into the room, by Fubii. And
you know, they were really intense about it. Even though I'm
older, I got scared, haha.
